contest-event.event-date: Jan. 30, 1972 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven] Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 5 bands competed.
